## GlyphManager.getCharWidth() method

Measuring width of a character

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCharWidth(char: string, font: Font): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  char | string | The character to be measured |
|  font | [Font](doc/markdown/./device.font.md) | Font of the character |

**Returns:**

number

Width of the character
